title: No. 1, 1958
provenance_text:
Winfred Gaul [1928-2003], Düsseldorf-Kaiserswerth, Germany; Galerie Inge Ahlers, Mannheim, Germany [1]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, March 1959 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The work was exhibited (no. 166) "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. It was lent by Galerie Inge Ahlers. 
[2]. The work was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International. It was accessioned on March 25, 1959.
